basic.summary: German has more than 10 years working on all the development cycle collaborating with IT and business partners to design, develop, and troubleshoot end-to-end technical solutions. More than two years leading teams; his main expertise is in the JAVA stack with its different frameworks; also has experience in NodeJs, Vue, DevOps, cloud, and Kubernetes and really loves knowledge. He is passionate about software development and has the ability to work under pressure in interdisciplinary teams with the capacity to face and overcome constant challenges.
